text: 2 NP True or False Let X and X’ be decision problems, where both problems have Yes instances and No instances. State whether you think each of the following statements must be true, must be false, or is an open question. Justify your answer. 1. Statement: If X <, X’ and X is not in NP, then X’ is not in NP. 2. Statement: If X <, X', X is in P and X’ is in NP, then X’ must be in P.
